items.headline: Learn the essentials of a fundamentally good kitchen, mastering basic techniques, and preparing delicious recipes
objectives_summary: You will learn how to equip your kitchen with efficiently with equipment you will repeatedly use, including spices.  Also, how to make basic chicken and beef stocks which have a variety of applications, basic roux, compound butter, and more.  Finally, you will learn some delicious recipes and how to make great sauces, which will be a strong foundation for exploring your own culinary world and experiment with your own creations.   You’ll be able to transform an average meal into an extraordinary one

visible_instructors.title: Allan Mulholland
visible_instructors.name: Allan

items.headline: Impress your friends and colleagues with your mastery of fine dining etiquette.
objectives_summary: This course will guide you through the proper dining etiquette that applies to most common servings of meat, game and fish as well as a variety of ancillary dishes and desserts that complement most formal dinners.
You will learn in simple and straightforward language how to assert yourself as an expert at the traditional and modern dinner table.
I will give you many examples on ‘what to do’ with the dishes that are placed in front of you and how to avoid any embarrassing faux pas.

items.title: 30 Tea Cultures Around the World
items.headline: A course that goes into detail about the histories, myths, and legends surrounding tea cultures around the world.
objectives_summary: An understanding of the basics of tea - including the six different types with tea, different tea processing methods, and the health benefits associated with different teas
The histories, myths, and stories surrounding tea in 30 cultures around the world, and the cultural significance of each one
Traditional tea brewing methods in rural and nomadic societies that you can recreate at home
